room_title: Escape room "Claustrophobia" by Riddles Escape Room in Myrtle Beach
room_address: 9713 N. Kings Highway Myrtle Beach, SC 29577
room_description:
Youâ€™ve been invited to tour with world-renowned archaeologists as they study a private pyramid that is exclusively opened one day every 10 years. When you accidentally trigger an ancient trap, you find yourselves trapped in a hidden chamber. You have 30 minutes to devise an escape plan or the pyramid will become your tomb for the next 10 years.
A 30-minute extreme escape adventure for two people. The smallest escape room in the country. This room might be a little scary, but nothing jumps out or touches you. Must not be claustrophobic!
